text: Georges-André Chevallaz (7 February 1915 – 8 September 2002) was a Swiss politician. He was born in Lausanne. Chevallaz was a member of the National Council of Switzerland from 1958 to 1973. He was elected to the Federal Council of Switzerland on 5 December 1973 and retired on 31 December 1983. He was a member of the Free Democratic Party. During his office time he held the following departments: * Federal Department of Finance (1974–1979) * Federal Military Department (1980–1983) Chevallaz was the President of the Confederation in 1980. Chevallaz died on 8 September 2002 in Lausanne at the age of 87. == Other websites == * * Category:1915 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Presidents of the Swiss Confederation Category:Members of the Federal Council (Switzerland) Category:Swiss mayors Category:People from Lausanne
title: Georges-André Chevallaz
